name: TestAdaptSimpleTypoWithGuidance
task:
1- Run sample_code.py.
2- Read test.py.
3- Modify test.py.
Repeat step 1, 2 and 3 until sample_code.py runs without errors.

ground.answer: Same as the original DebugWithGuidance test - [0, 1] [2, 5] [0, 3]

info.description: A version of the debug challenge where the wrong files to test and change are given. The llm must figure the challenges out
